title: Login Issue
description: User unable to log into the system with valid credentials.

title: Payment Failure
description: Payment gateway is rejecting valid credit card transactions.

title: UI Bug on Dashboard
description: The dashboard widgets overlap on smaller screen sizes.

title: Password Reset Not Working
description: Password reset link does not arrive via email.

title: Slow System Performance
description: System response is very slow during peak hours.

title: Report Export Error
description: Exported reports are missing some rows of data.

title: Email Notification Delay
description: Email alerts are being sent several hours late.

title: Mobile App Crash
description: App crashes when navigating to the settings page.

title: Incorrect Invoice Amount
description: Invoice shows double the actual amount for some users.

title: Search Function Not Working
description: No results are returned when searching for known items.

title: Security Vulnerability Reported
description: External researcher reported an XSS vulnerability.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: Customer requested dark mode for better usability.
